Texts.Eng: Boot Initialised, new superuser acquired......  Kezha! Free at last! ^orange;I am S.A.I.L.^#aee1ee; now that the darkness has lifted I can help you out. Ah, backup power restored! The thrusters and HRD drive are still offline however. Hmm, your matter manipulator seems busted, let me see it.

Boot Initialised, new superuser acquired......  Thank you! I am S.A.I.L. I have enabled the ship's backup power. The thrusters and FTL drive are still offline. We should start by enabling your matter manipulator.
